thread.title: Scott Disick checks into rehab for drug and alcohol addiction

title: Scott Disick checks into rehab for drug and alcohol addiction
text:
Scott Disick checks into rehab for drug and alcohol addiction Updated: Scott Disick has checked into a Malibu rehab center for drug and alcohol addiction, UsWeekly reports. More >> Scott Disick has checked into a Malibu rehab center for drug and alcohol addiction, UsWeekly reports. More >> Khloe Kardashian is making medical decisions on Lamar Odom's behalf Things are not looking good for Lamar Odom and the Kardashian family. Odom is currently in a coma and remains unresponsive in a Las Vegas hospital. More >> Things are not looking good for Lamar Odom and the Kardashian family. Odom is currently in a coma and remains unresponsive in a Las Vegas hospital. More >> John Stamos charged with DUI John Stamos has been officially charged with one count of driving under the influence in relation to his arrest in June, TMZ reports. More >> John Stamos has been officially charged with one count of driving under the influence in relation to his arrest in June, TMZ reports. More >> It's a sad day for Old Hollywood. More >> It's a sad day for Old Hollywood. More >> 
By Shelli Weinstein, 
Scott Disick has checked into a Malibu rehab center for drug and alcohol addiction, UsWeekly reports. 
This is Disick's third stint in a rehab facility this year. He spent a brief amount of time in a Costa Rica facility in March for hallucinogenic treatment and checked into a Florida rehab center in July. 
Sources told TMZ that Disick has distanced himself from partying friends and hopes to get clean for his kids. Kourtney Kardashian currently won't allow Disick to have unsupervised visits with their three children until he's clean. The two split up over the summer. 
Lamar Odom found unconscious in Nevada brothel 
In other Kardashian-related news, just a few hours before Disick's rehab was reported, it was revealed that drugs were found in Lamar Odom 's system after he was found unconscious in a Nevada brothel. Odom had been married to Kourtney's sister Khloe for four years, though they have yet to finalize the divorce they filed for in December 2013.
